title: Create extractCommandHelp utility module
description: Create cli/src/utils/extractCommandHelp.ts with tool detection, help extraction function, and error handling

title: Phase 2: Core Implementation - Implement extraction engine and utilities
Design extraction algorithm for detecting and extracting subcommands
description: Design algorithm for subcommand detection logic, recursive extraction approach, and identify edge cases

title: Create usage examples showing AI using help reference
description: Create example prompts, show example command generation, provide before/after comparison

title: Phase 5: Documentation - Update documentation and examples
Implement subcommand detection logic
description: Add subcommand parsing function, pattern matching for common help formats, support for multiple help styles

title: Test AI integration with generated help reference
description: Test AI command generation with help reference, verify accuracy improvement, document test scenarios

title: Optimize extraction performance
description: Optimize parallel execution, consider caching, tune timeouts

title: Design Markdown output format for AI-friendly help reference
description: Design Markdown template, hierarchy (tool → command → subcommand), and code block formatting

title: Create troubleshooting guide for command help
description: Document common issues and solutions, create troubleshooting section

title: Conduct thorough code review
description: Review code, address issues, verify best practices

title: Implement subcommand detection logic
description: Add subcommand parsing function, pattern matching for common help formats, support for multiple help styles

title: Implement error recovery and handling
description: Add graceful handling of missing tools, timeout handling, clear error messages, non-blocking failures

title: Update coordination manifest
description: Update .augment/coordination.json with this change, link all tasks and specs

title: Phase 3: Integration - Integrate extraction with augx init command
Write integration tests for GUI
description: Test full GUI workflow. Test Marketing module linking. Test config changes. Test cross-platform compatibility. Test with 20+ modules. Ensure integration tests pass, performance <2s with 20+ modules, works on Windows/macOS/Linux, no regressions. Create cli/src/__tests__/gui-integration.test.ts.

title: Perform accessibility audit
description: Run Lighthouse accessibility audit. Add ARIA attributes. Test with screen reader. Verify keyboard navigation. Check color contrast ratios. Ensure WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance, Lighthouse score >90, screen reader compatible, keyboard-only usable.

title: Update documentation for GUI improvements
description: Update README.md with GUI customization section. Update docs/CLI_REFERENCE.md with new options. Add screenshots to docs/QUICK_START.md. Update CHANGELOG.md with v0.4.1 entry. Create troubleshooting guide. Ensure all docs updated, screenshots included, examples clear, troubleshooting comprehensive.

title: Add tooltips and visual indicators
description: Add hover tooltips for module descriptions. Implement status badges (linked, available, deprecated). Add category icons. Implement loading states. Add empty state messaging. Ensure tooltips appear on hover, badges display correctly, icons match VS Code theme, loading states smooth.

title: Implement keyboard navigation
description: Add arrow key navigation. Implement Tab/Shift+Tab support. Add Enter/Space for selection. Add Escape to cancel. Ensure focus indicators visible. Verify full keyboard navigation works, focus indicators visible, shortcuts documented, no keyboard traps.

title: Write unit tests for GUI
description: Test formatModuleChoice function. Test config loading. Test search/filter logic. Test module loading with Marketing module. Achieve 100% coverage for new code. Ensure all tests pass, 100% coverage for new code, edge cases covered, mock data comprehensive. Create cli/src/__tests__/gui.test.ts, cli/src/__tests__/module-loading.test.ts, cli/src/__tests__/gui-helpers.test.ts.

title: Add configuration options for extraction behavior
description: Add config options for enabling/disabling extraction, specifying additional tools, and output location

title: Module Inspection Commands - Complete Implementation
description: Implement comprehensive module inspection commands for the Augment CLI with 8 phases: Core Command Structure, Content Viewing, Output Formats, Advanced Features, Security and Performance, VS Code Integration, Extensibility, and Testing and Documentation. Total: 34 tasks, 42 hours estimated.

title: Implement Markdown output format
description: Add Markdown output format for documentation. Deliverables: Markdown formatter, proper header hierarchy, code block formatting. Estimated: 1 hour

title: Implement plain text output format
description: Add plain text output format for terminal display. Deliverables: Text formatter, column alignment, ASCII-only output. Estimated: 1 hour

title: Implement format conversion utilities
description: Create utilities for converting between formats. Deliverables: Format converter functions, format detection, format validation. Estimated: 0.5 hours

title: Implement depth control for recursion
description: Add --depth flag to control submodule recursion. Deliverables: Depth parameter parsing, recursive module inspection, depth limit enforcement (max 5). Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Implement file filtering
description: Add --filter flag to include/exclude files by pattern. Deliverables: Glob pattern matching, multiple filter support, exclude filter support. Estimated: 2 hours

title: Implement search functionality
description: Add --search flag to search within module content. Deliverables: Text search function, match highlighting, context display (lines before/after). Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Implement pagination support
description: Add pagination for large output. Deliverables: Pagination logic, page navigation (space, arrows, q), page indicators. Estimated: 1 hour

title: Implement sensitive data redaction
description: Add --secure flag to redact sensitive data. Deliverables: Redaction patterns (API_KEY, SECRET, TOKEN, PASSWORD), configurable redaction rules, redaction logging. Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Implement caching mechanism
description: Add caching for inspection results. Deliverables: Cache storage (in-memory or file-based), cache invalidation on file changes, --no-cache flag. Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Optimize file reading with streaming
description: Implement streaming for large files to reduce memory usage. Deliverables: Stream-based file reader, chunked content processing, memory usage monitoring. Estimated: 1 hour

title: Add progress indicators
description: Display progress indicators for long operations. Deliverables: Progress bar for file scanning, spinner for processing, cancellation support (Ctrl+C). Estimated: 0.5 hours

title: Implement clickable file links
description: Make file paths clickable in VS Code terminal. Deliverables: VS Code terminal link format, file path to URI conversion, line number support in links. Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Implement editor integration
description: Add functionality to open files directly in VS Code editor. Deliverables: VS Code API integration, file opening command, editor focus handling. Estimated: 1 hour

title: Implement preview pane support
description: Add --preview flag to open files in VS Code preview pane. Deliverables: Preview pane API integration, read-only preview mode, syntax highlighting in preview. Estimated: 1 hour

title: Enhance syntax highlighting for VS Code
description: Improve syntax highlighting integration with VS Code. Deliverables: VS Code theme integration, language-specific highlighting, code block detection. Estimated: 0.5 hours

title: Create plugin system architecture
description: Design and implement plugin system for custom handlers. Deliverables: Plugin interface definition, plugin loader, plugin registration mechanism. Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Implement configuration support
description: Add augment.json configuration file support. Deliverables: Configuration file parser, configuration validation, default configuration generation. Estimated: 1 hour

title: Implement custom inspection handlers
description: Allow custom handlers for different module types. Deliverables: Handler interface, handler registration, handler execution. Estimated: 1 hour

title: Create hook system
description: Implement pre/post inspection hooks. Deliverables: Hook interface, hook registration, hook execution with error handling. Estimated: 0.5 hours

title: Write unit tests for module discovery
description: Create unit tests for module discovery and metadata extraction. Deliverables: Test suite for module search, test suite for metadata extraction, mock module fixtures. Estimated: 1 hour

title: Write integration tests
description: Create end-to-end integration tests. Deliverables: Test suite for complete workflows, test suite for VS Code integration, test suite for error handling. Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Write performance tests
description: Create performance benchmarks and tests. Deliverables: Performance test suite, benchmark results, performance regression detection. Estimated: 0.5 hours

title: Write command documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for all commands. Deliverables: Command reference documentation, usage examples for each flag, troubleshooting guide. Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Create usage examples
description: Create practical usage examples. Deliverables: Example workflows, AI integration examples, OpenSpec/Beads integration examples. Estimated: 0.5 hours

title: Implement file listing functionality
description: List all files in a module with metadata. Deliverables: Recursive file scanner, file metadata extraction (size, modified date, type), directory grouping. Estimated: 2 hours

title: Implement aggregated content view
description: Aggregate and display all *.md files in a module. Deliverables: Content aggregation function, file section headers, markdown formatting preservation. Estimated: 2.5 hours

title: Implement individual file inspection
description: Display individual file content with line numbers. Deliverables: File content reader, line numbering, file path resolution (relative paths). Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Implement syntax highlighting
description: Add syntax highlighting for code blocks and file content. Deliverables: Syntax highlighter integration, language detection from file extension, color scheme configuration. Estimated: 2 hours

title: Implement JSON output format
description: Add JSON output format for programmatic consumption. Deliverables: JSON formatter for module data, proper indentation and escaping, schema validation. Estimated: 1.5 hours

title: Create command help extraction spec
description: Create openspec/specs/augment-extensions/command-help-extraction.md with extraction process, output format, error handling, and security considerations

title: Perform cross-platform testing
description: Test on Windows, macOS, and Linux; resolve platform-specific issues

title: Add keyboard shortcuts and accessibility
description: Implement keyboard shortcuts and accessibility features. Add keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+S for search, Ctrl+A for select all, etc.), screen reader compatibility, and help screen with shortcuts.

title: Write unit tests for modular architecture
description: Create unit tests for module loading and discovery. Test HTML, CSS, JS module loading, collection loading, and module discovery.

title: Write unit tests for GUI components
description: Create unit tests for GUI components. Test multi-selection, search/filtering, and keyboard navigation.

title: Write integration tests for unlink and self-remove
description: Create integration tests for unlinking and self-removal. Test module unlinking, collection unlinking, self-remove (dry-run and actual), and dependency checking.

title: Design GUI architecture and component structure
description: Design the terminal GUI architecture using inquirer library. Create architecture document, component breakdown, and user flow diagrams.

title: Phase 1: Foundation & Architecture
description: Foundation and architecture setup for module inspection. Includes project setup, command registry, and configuration system. Total: 6 hours.

title: Project Setup
description: Create module inspection directory structure in URL Reference extension. Set up TypeScript configuration. Add dependencies: Babel/Acorn, PHP-Parser, testing frameworks. Create base interfaces and types (InspectionResult, ModuleInfo, etc.). Acceptance: Directory structure matches spec, dependencies installed, TypeScript compiles, base types defined.

title: Command Registry
description: Implement command registration system. Create command handlers for all 4 core commands (urlref.inspect.module, urlref.inspect.dependencies, urlref.inspect.security, urlref.generate.report). Set up VS Code Command Palette integration. Add command activation events. Acceptance: All commands appear in Command Palette, commands invokable with stubs, error handling for missing files, commands respect VS Code context.

title: Configuration System
description: Create configuration schema (augment.json). Implement configuration loader. Add VS Code settings integration. Create default configuration. Acceptance: Config loads from augment.json and VS Code settings, validation for config values, defaults applied when missing, config changes trigger reload.

title: Phase 2: Language Parsers
description: Implement parsers for JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and PHP. Extract exports, imports, functions, classes, variables. Total: 8 hours.

title: JavaScript/TypeScript Parser
description: Implement Babel/Acorn parser integration. Extract exports, imports, functions, classes, variables. Parse JSDoc comments. Handle TypeScript syntax. Acceptance: Parses ES6+ and TypeScript correctly, extracts all required elements, handles syntax errors gracefully, returns structured InspectionResult. Test cases: exports/imports, classes with methods, async functions, malformed code.

title: Python Parser
description: Implement Python ast module integration. Extract imports, functions, classes, variables. Parse docstrings. Support Python 3.7+. Acceptance: Parses Python 3.7+ syntax, extracts all required elements, handles indentation errors gracefully, returns structured InspectionResult. Test cases: imports, classes with methods and docstrings, decorators, syntax errors.

title: PHP Parser
description: Integrate PHP-Parser (nikic/php-parser). Extract namespaces, classes, functions, constants. Parse PHPDoc comments. Support PHP 7.4+ and PSR-4. Acceptance: Parses PHP 7.4+ syntax, extracts all required elements, handles parse errors gracefully, returns structured InspectionResult. Test cases: class with namespace, functions with PHPDoc, traits and interfaces, syntax errors.

title: Phase 3: Inspection Engine
description: Implement content inspector, dependency analyzer, and security scanner. Total: 6 hours.

title: Content Inspector
description: Implement module content inspection logic. Add filtering by element type (functions, classes, etc.). Create output formatter. Add caching for parsed ASTs. Acceptance: Inspects modules in all supported languages, filters work correctly, results cached for performance, output formatted consistently.

title: Dependency Analyzer
description: Extract dependencies from imports/requires. Resolve package versions (package.json, requirements.txt, composer.json). Build dependency tree. Validate external URLs. Acceptance: Identifies all dependencies, resolves versions correctly, builds hierarchical tree, validates URLs with existing URL Reference logic.

title: Security Scanner
description: Implement security rules for each language. Scan for common vulnerabilities (unhandled promises, eval, hardcoded credentials, SQL injection, XSS, etc.). Generate security findings with severity. Provide remediation suggestions. Acceptance: Detects all specified security issues, assigns correct severity levels, provides actionable remediation, no false positives on test cases.

title: Phase 4: Report Generation
description: Implement text, JSON, and Markdown formatters. Add webview integration. Total: 4 hours.

title: Text Formatter
description: Implement plain text report formatter. Format for console/output channel display. Include all report sections. Add color coding for severity levels. Acceptance: Readable plain text output, proper alignment and spacing, color codes work in VS Code output channel, all sections included.

title: JSON Formatter
description: Implement JSON report formatter. Follow InspectionResult schema. Add pretty-printing option. Support streaming for large results. Acceptance: Valid JSON output, matches schema exactly, pretty-print option works, handles large results efficiently.

title: Markdown Formatter
description: Implement Markdown report formatter. Generate tables for exports/imports. Add code blocks for snippets. Include Mermaid diagrams for dependency trees. Acceptance: Valid Markdown output, tables render correctly, code blocks have proper syntax highlighting, Mermaid diagrams display in VS Code preview.

title: Webview Integration
description: Create webview provider for interactive reports. Add navigation between sections. Support export to file. Add refresh capability. Acceptance: Webview displays formatted reports, navigation works smoothly, export saves to user-selected location, refresh updates with latest data.

title: Phase 5: VS Code Integration
description: Implement VS Code integration including output channel, webview provider, context menus, and status bar. Total: 4 hours.

title: Output Channel Integration
description: Create dedicated output channel for inspection results. Add logging for operations. Implement progress indicators. Add clear/reset functionality. Acceptance: Output channel appears in VS Code, results display correctly, progress shown for long operations, clear button works.

title: Webview Provider
description: Implement webview provider class. Add HTML/CSS for report display. Handle webview lifecycle. Add message passing for interactions. Acceptance: Webview opens on command, HTML renders correctly, lifecycle managed properly (dispose, refresh), user interactions work (clicks, navigation).

title: Context Menu Integration
description: Add context menu items for file explorer. Add context menu items for editor. Filter by file type (only show for supported languages). Add keyboard shortcuts. Acceptance: Context menu items appear on right-click, only shown for supported file types, keyboard shortcuts work, commands execute correctly from context menu.

title: Status Bar Integration
description: Add status bar item for quick access. Show inspection status (idle, running, complete). Add click handler to open last report. Add tooltip with details. Acceptance: Status bar item visible, status updates correctly, click opens last report, tooltip shows relevant info.

title: Phase 6: AI Integration
description: Implement AI integration with prompt templates, summary generation, optimization suggestions, and refactoring recommendations. Total: 4 hours.

title: Prompt Template System
description: Create prompt template engine. Implement 3 core templates (summary, optimization, refactoring). Add variable substitution. Support custom templates via configuration. Acceptance: Templates render with inspection data, variable substitution works correctly, custom templates load from config, templates validate before use.

title: AI Summary Generation
description: Integrate with Augmentcode AI. Generate module summaries. Add caching for AI responses. Handle API errors gracefully. Acceptance: Summaries generated correctly, responses cached for performance, errors handled with fallback, user can retry on failure.

title: Optimization Suggestions
description: Generate optimization suggestions via AI. Categorize by type (performance, quality, security). Rank by impact. Add code examples for suggestions. Acceptance: Suggestions relevant to module, categorization accurate, ranking makes sense, code examples helpful.

title: Refactoring Recommendations
description: Generate refactoring recommendations. Base on complexity metrics. Provide step-by-step guidance. Link to relevant documentation. Acceptance: Recommendations based on metrics, guidance actionable, links work correctly, recommendations prioritized.

title: Phase 7: Testing & Documentation
description: Implement unit tests, integration tests, documentation, and performance testing. Total: 6 hours.

title: Unit Tests
description: Write unit tests for all parsers. Write unit tests for inspection engine. Write unit tests for formatters. Achieve >80% code coverage. Acceptance: All tests pass, coverage >80%, edge cases covered, error paths tested.

title: Integration Tests
description: Write end-to-end command tests. Test VS Code integration. Test AI integration. Test configuration loading. Acceptance: All integration tests pass, commands work end-to-end, VS Code APIs mocked correctly, configuration scenarios covered.

title: Documentation
description: Update extension README with new commands. Create usage examples for each language. Document configuration options. Add troubleshooting guide. Acceptance: README complete and accurate, examples work as documented, all config options documented, troubleshooting covers common issues.

title: Performance Testing
description: Benchmark all operations. Verify performance targets met. Optimize bottlenecks. Document performance characteristics. Acceptance: All benchmarks meet targets, no performance regressions, bottlenecks identified and fixed, performance documented.

title: Implement Markdown generation function
description: Create Markdown generation function with template-based output and proper escaping/formatting

title: Phase 1: Specification - Create formal specifications and design for dynamic command help
Create integration tests for full extraction flow
description: Test with all tools present, missing tools, command failures, and verify output file correctness

title: Modify augx init command to call extraction
description: Update cli/src/commands/init.ts to call extraction, add extraction step, add progress logging

title: Implement recursive help extraction
description: Add recursive extraction logic, depth limiting to prevent infinite loops, parallel execution for performance

title: Audit security of command execution
description: Verify path validation, check for command injection vulnerabilities, confirm sandboxing

title: Create unit tests for extraction utilities
description: Tests for tool detection, help extraction, subcommand parsing, and Markdown generation

title: Module Inspection Commands - Complete Implementation
description: Implement comprehensive module inspection commands for the Augment CLI with 8 phases: Core Command Structure, Content Viewing, Output Formats, Advanced Features, Security and Performance, VS Code Integration, Extensibility, and Testing and Documentation. Total: 34 tasks, 42 hours estimated.

title: Archive OpenSpec change to archive directory
description: Move completed change to openspec/archive/, include all files, update README

title: Phase 6: Finalization - Final checks, validation, and archival
Phase 2: Core Implementation - Implement extraction engine and utilities
